body_html:
Thanks for pointing me to the script. I am actually wondering if the loopback RDMA performance could reflect the actual in-fabric performance. Honestly I am not sure if hardware is involved at all when using loopback; it might use a completely different mechanism than NIC doing DMA.

Nevertheless this patch will still help in the case of local worker-ps communication.

body:
Thanks for pointing me to the script. I am actually wondering if the loopback RDMA performance could reflect the actual in-fabric performance. Honestly I am not sure if hardware is involved at all when using loopback; it might use a completely different mechanism than NIC doing DMA.

Nevertheless this patch will still help in the case of local worker-ps communication.
